content: Compose a verse for the nursery rhyme, "Mary Had a Little Lamb".

Sure, here's a new verse for "Mary Had a Little Lamb":

Mary had a little lamb,  
Its fleece was soft as snow,  
And everywhere that Mary went,  
The lamb was sure to go.  

It followed her to school one day,  
Which made the children smile,  
They laughed and played and sang with joy,  
And stayed a little while.
